titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an Charles Kay Ogden, 27. 3. 1923
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original an der ÖNB (Autogr. 1270/42-6); Kopie im BA. Publiziert (Ogden, S. 70).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: I wrote to you the other day as an answer to your P.C. addressed to Puchberg. Just now I got the kard forwarded from Hasbach. I got the meaning of meaning & the M. Guardian. I have not heard from Keynes & haven't got the Times you mention. My address is: Puchberg am Schneeberg Nieder-Österreich, Austria.
Did Keynes write to me? If so, please tell him it hasn't reached me.
